review: This product works exactly as stated. Great picture and easy set up are two of the best features. The Prime (free) movies are very limited and the pay per view movies are less than you would find on your cable company's on-demand service and there is no price benefit to using Amazon for your movie purchases.The games are minimal in number and the controller does not work seemlessly with them.This is an average product at best and I don't think I will be using it frequently.
author: MarkA

review: Easy to use right out of the box. Good variety of apps. Could use better prime movies.
